title: Why is my fps in lol low on mac
body: I've just downloaded league on my mac and my fps is 90-100 sometimes below 90, compare to league of legends on windows its 120 + fps. Ive been looking on the internet on how to fix this but it won't work. Riot can you fix this.

replies.body:
There could be a number of different things that are affecting the FPS on your Mac. There might be a wonky game file on the Mac that is effecting your gameplay, or it could be something more simple like your game settings. Check out our Mac [**FPS Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#section-mac)) for some ways you can give your FPS a little boost.

Let me know how that works!
Lol  dude mac aint gaming pc. I have mac 2011 and i have played with 60 -50 fps 4 years so 90 is good for a mac
